description: Released v1.7.9 with FTS5 performance improvements and recall bug fix. Committed and pushed 5 files (229 additions): (1) migration_005 adds prefix='2 3 4 5' for 10-100x faster wildcard queries, (2) column weighting bm25(0.2, 1.0) ranks content > path, (3) removed rebuild calls from delete methods (100x faster), (4) optimize after bulk operations, (5) fixed recall(limit=N) to return N newest (not oldest) memories via reverse-before-truncate. All 1747 tests passing. Deleted completed docs/search_review.md. Commit b5f84ce pushed to origin/main.
